verses.text: \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* hath \w believed|strong="H0539"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w report|strong="H8052"\w*? \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w revealed|strong="H1540"\w*?

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w grow|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w as|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w tender|strong="H3126"\w* plant \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w as|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w root|strong="H8328"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* thirsty \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*: \w there|strong="H5927"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* beauty \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* comeliness: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w we|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w there|strong="H5927"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* sightliness, \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w we|strong="H0776"\w* \w should|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* desirous \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*:

\w Despised|strong="H0959"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w most|strong="H4480"\w* abject \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w a|strong="H4480"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w sorrows|strong="H4341"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w acquainted|strong="H3045"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* infirmity: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* look \w was|strong="H0376"\w* \w as|strong="H2803"\w* \w it|strong="H3045"\w* \w were|strong="H0376"\w* hidden \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w despised|strong="H0959"\w*, whereupon we \w esteemed|strong="H2803"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Surely|strong="H0403"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* hath \w borne|strong="H5375"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* infirmities \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* \w sorrows|strong="H4341"\w*: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w have|strong="H5375"\w* \w thought|strong="H2803"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w as|strong="H2803"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w were|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H5375"\w* leper, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w as|strong="H2803"\w* \w one|strong="H1931"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w by|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H5060"\w*.

\w But|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w wounded|strong="H2490"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* bruised \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w sins|strong="H5771"\w*: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* chastisement \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H7965"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* bruises we \w are|strong="H6588"\w* \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w we|strong="H3605"\w* \w like|strong="H1870"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w gone|strong="H8582"\w* \w astray|strong="H8582"\w*, \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* hath \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* aside \w into|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath laid \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w us|strong="H0853"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* offered \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w own|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w led|strong="H2986"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H2874"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* dumb \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* \w lamb|strong="H7716"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* shearer, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* distress, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*: \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* declare \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*? \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w cut|strong="H1504"\w* \w off|strong="H1504"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* wickedness \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* struck \w him|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6310"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ungodly|strong="H7563"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w burial|strong="H6913"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*: \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* iniquity, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H5414"\w* there \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w pleased|strong="H2654"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* bruise \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* infirmity: \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* \w down|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w sin|strong="H0817"\w*, \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* long-lived \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w prosperous|strong="H6743"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H5771"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* hath laboured, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w filled|strong="H7646"\w*: \w by|strong="H6662"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w justify|strong="H6663"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w bear|strong="H5445"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* distribute \w to|strong="H5315"\w* \w him|strong="H0854"\w* \w very|strong="H3651"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w spoils|strong="H7998"\w* \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w strong|strong="H6099"\w*, \w because|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath delivered \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* unto \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* reputed \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* wicked: \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w borne|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w sins|strong="H2399"\w* \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* hath prayed \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w transgressors|strong="H6586"\w*.
